message: PBR.

I blame Portland.
If it's got a squid on the bottle, it's delicious. PERIOD.
I still go for Jack & Coke
I just like it
People give me a hard time for it these days, but oh well.
Are any of you guys Fernet-lovers? If you are, I think that should be listed as a guilty pleasure :P  (Personally, I hate the stuff)
I've become a horrible booze snop.

jagermeister, and I have no idea why
TUACA
That shit is DANGEROUS
That's your guilty pleasure? Church?
Strongly Agree, as if it were law.
I've recently realized my social group is rather unusual in using that...
also: http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=KwXTrodgu-4

On my most recent dive, before it I had just gotten word that my girlfriend had to put one of our (absurdly old) cats down... super sad... so I knew that I was in a drinkin' mood. But you can't drink before you dive because, you know, you'll probably die. So, I put a bottle of Tuaca in the staging area. So, I got out of the water, walked up to that place, took off my BC, and opened the bottle and started drinking.
church
If not, might I suggest a new location?
It's protected under constitution here, you know. Free speech. We even have things called juice bars - strip clubs that cater to the 18-20 crowd. No beer, but lots of boobs and soda.
wait, http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=mkwXYltsGuo is more real.

I'm with @ericflo. jack & coke just tastes like comfort food
jack and coke used to be comfort food, but too many sweet drinks like that and i'm death the next morning
Rum and Coke (aka cuba libre) > Jack and Coke
my rum drink gotos are dark n stormy and moscow mules
jameson+rocks
i'd submit that toranto and hanky panky cocktails will make anyone a fan of fernet-infused cocktails

@ericflo Rum and Coke is better :)
@ericmoritz not when you've got awesome homemade ginger beer like I do. ;)
+1 on Rum and Coke here, though Jamaican in-laws will rather predispose you towards rum...also, honeymoons in Jamaica...

My guilty pleasure (other than the above) is just taking whatever clear liquor is lying around (usually vodka) and mixing it with whatever juice is lying around, and drinking that. Thank God I found good beer eventually.
Had a dark and stormy made with ginger beer, a shot of rum, a scoop of rum ice cream and a small amount of lime ice last night, god damn that was delicious
Ginger beer makes everything better
